fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: Every time you enter a Limited Room, you get the Room benefit and not count toward the Room total.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Storm: Pick a Room. Anyone who tries to enter that Room will instead enter another available Room. They will learn they were displaced by the Peasant. [1 uses, Unique, Day-Only]
- Mob: Pick a Room available in this Night phase. Everyone who enters that Room will take 1 HP Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. Does not apply to players affected by Storm. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only]
- Pilfer: Stop ALL players (except yourself) from receiving Limited Room benefits. All Card Point Rooms will also have their prices raised by 2 Card Points. Players will know the Rooms were affected by the Peasant. [1 use, Unique]
